titleStmt.title: Modus tenendi Parliamenta in Hibernia. Published out of an antient record by the Right Reverend Father in God, Anthony, Lord Bishop of Meath. To which is added the rules and customs of the House, gathered out of the Journal books from the time of Edward the Sixth, by H.S.E., C.P.
titleStmt.author: Scobell, Henry, d. 1660.
Dopping, Anthony, 1643-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook, assignee of Ben. Tooke, Printer to their Majesties, and are to be sold at his house on Ormond-Key, and by the booksellers of Dublin,

notesStmt.note: "Rules and customs", on the English House of Commons, was gathered and compiled by H. Scobell. Cf. BM.
Imperfect: tightly bound with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Lincoln's Inn Library.
